channel.title: Do i have to download Himachi to stop getting 'Error connecting to server'?
channel.description:
OMG!!! Moparscape is driving me crazy!
It wont let me log into Hybridscape, My 127.0.0.1 or any other server!
So do i HAVE to download Himachi for it to not 'Error Connecting to server'??
Plz!

item.title: Do i have to download Himachi to stop getting 'Error connecting to server'?

item.description:

try a different user name

and hamachi is so otehr players can connect
